IX.i.3.D.3.a
.
Applicability of Deductions for Final Expenses
A claimant’s income for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) purposes may be reduced by deducting amounts paid for certain funeral and other last expenses.
Allow a deduction
only
for expenses actually paid by the claimant that will not be reimbursed.
Final expenses are a factor in
current-law pension cases, per
38 CFR 3.272(h)
Parents’ DIC cases, per
38 CFR 3.262(o)
, and
Section 306 Pension cases, per
38 CFR 3.262(n)
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Reduction of Income Due to Unreimbursed Expenses
